item.title: LeetCode Weekly Contest 156 and others
item.author: PwzXxm
item.description: Second week of LeetCode Challenge. Participated the virtual contest. Weekly Contest 156 1207. Unique Number of Occurrences https://leetcode.com/contest/weekly-contest-156/problems/unique-number-of-occurrences/ Brute force. item.title: LeetCode Weekly Contest 155 and others
item.author: PwzXxm
item.description: This is the first week of LeetCode Challenges. It includes weekly contest 155 and other problems. Weekly Contest 155 https://leetcode.com/contest/weekly-contest-155 1200. Minimum Absolute Difference https://leetcode.com/contest/weekly-contest-155/problems/minimum-absolute-difference/ Brute force.
